subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 35 points and hit the clinching jumper in the final minute to lead the Boston Celtics to their fifth straight victory, 106-100, over the Charlotte Bobcats last night.
snippet: Paul Pierce scored 35 points and hit the clinching jumper in the final minute to lead the Boston Celtics to their fifth straight victory, 106-100, over the Charlotte Bobcats last night.
